name: Feel the Rhythm
description:
I am a graduate student in computer science and this game is my master's thesis project. It is a project surrounding accessibility in games. This game has visuals, but is intended to be played with only audio and vibration cues. If you are visually impaired, you should be able to play this game. If you are not visually impaired, I invite you to close your eyes as you play.

Please note that this game requires a controller with vibration enabled, and headphones or dual speakers.
